cards.name: Statue Of Liberty
cards.desc:
Take this card when you roll at least 3 OUCH.
Gain 3 VICTORY_POINT when you take this card.
Lose 3 VICTORY_POINT when you lose this card.

cards.name: Superstar
cards.desc:
Take this card when you roll at least 3 VICTORY. Gain 1 VICTORY_POINT, +1 VICTORY_POINT per additional VICTORY you rolled.
While you have this card, you gain 1 VICTORY_POINT for each VICTORY you roll.

cards.name: Diva
cards.desc: The other monsters need 4 VICTORY to take Superstar from you.

cards.name: Hunter
cards.desc: Heal 1 damage each time you destroy an Infantry.

cards.name: Central Park
cards.desc:
Buy this card for 1 ENERGY_POINT less if you are in MANHATTAN.
+2 VICTORY_POINT and heal 2 damage.

cards.name: Curse
cards.desc:
When you deal damage to Monsters, give each a Curse token. Each time a Monster wants to reroll OUCH, he must spend 1 ENERGY_POINT for each Curse token he has.
A Monster may use a HEART to discard a Curse token instead of using it to heal.

cards.name: Jinx Aura
cards.desc: Other Monsters must always use all their rerolls. (They still get to choose which dice to reroll.)

cards.name: Towering Titan
cards.desc: Add 2 ATTACK to your result.

cards.name: Painbow
cards.desc:
If your results are...
-- 2 DESTRUCTION, you get an extra ATTACK.
-- 4 DESTRUCTION, you get an extra 2 ATTACK.
-- 6 DESTRUCTION, you win the game!

cards.name: The Unisphere
cards.desc:
Buy this card for 1 ENERGY_POINT less if you are in QUEENS.
+4 VICTORY_POINT.

cards.name: Sharp Shooter
cards.desc:
You can destroy Jets that are not in your borough.
Gain 1 VICTORY_POINT each time you destroy a Jet.

cards.name: Stomp
cards.desc: Add 1 DESTRUCTION to your result.

cards.name: King of Queens
cards.desc: Gain 1 ENERGY_POINT and heal 1 damage when you start your turn in Queens.

cards.name: Power Substation
cards.desc: +1 VICTORY_POINT, +8 ENERGY_POINT and take 3 damage.

cards.name: FlatIron Building
cards.desc:
Buy this card for 1 ENERGY_POINT less if you are in MANHATTAN.
+2 VICTORY_POINT.

cards.name: Super Speed
cards.desc: You can have an extra move before rolling your dice.

cards.name: Drain
cards.desc: Take 2 ENERGY_POINT from Monsters that attack you.

cards.name: Power Trap
cards.desc: Each time a Monster gains at least 3 ENERGY_POINT in a turn, he must pay you 1 ENERGY_POINT.

cards.name: Bullet Proof
cards.desc: Whenever you take damage because of rolling OUCH, take 1 less damage.

cards.name: General Ellis
cards.desc:
You can only buy this card if you destroyed a Tank this turn.
+3 VICTORY_POINT and all Monsters take 1 damage.

cards.name: Coney Island
cards.desc:
Buy this card for 1 ENERGY_POINT less if you are in BROOKLYN.
+3 VICTORY_POINT.

cards.name: Personal Spotlight
cards.desc: Gain 1 VICTORY_POINT each turn you rolled at least 1 VICTORY.

cards.name: Shadow Double
cards.desc: Whenever you attack you deal double damage.

cards.name: Tesla Antennae
cards.desc: Monsters that have more HEART_POINT than you take 1 extra damage whenever you attack them.

cards.name: Leveler
cards.desc: Gain 1 VICTORY_POINT each turn that you destroy at least one Building.

cards.name: Air Force One
cards.desc:
You can only buy this card if you destroyed a Jet this turn.
+4 VICTORY_POINT and all Units attack all Monsters in their boroughs.

cards.name: Drink The Hudson
cards.desc:
Buy this card for 1 ENERGY_POINT less if you are in MANHATTAN, BROOKLYN, or STATEN ISLAND.
+13 ENERGY_POINT, +1 VICTORY_POINT, and heal 2 damage.

cards.name: Carapace
cards.desc:
Your HEART_POINT maximum is increased by 2 as long as you have this card. For each OUCH you roll, place a Carapace token on this card.
You can discard this card to heal 1 damage for each Carapace token on it.

cards.name: Fury
cards.desc: Add 1 DESTRUCTION and 1 ENERGY_POINT to your roll if you are in a borough with at least 3 Units.

cards.name: Pheonix Blood
cards.desc: Gain 1 ENERGY_POINT each time you take damage.

cards.name: Terminal Rage
cards.desc:
Take another turn when you buy this card.
From now on you can no longer reroll ATTACK.

cards.name: New York Marathon
cards.desc:
While this card is available for purchase, Monsters must pay 2 ENERGY_POINT to move (including fleeing from MANHATTAN), unless the movement is obligatory.
+2 VICTORY_POINT, +2 ENERGY_POINT, and heal 2 damage.

cards.name: Photo Op
cards.desc: Choose a Monster. Gain 1 VICTORY_POINT for each damage you dealt to that Monster this turn.

cards.name: Trash Thrower
cards.desc: Monsters you attack lose 1 VICTORY_POINT.

cards.name: Universal Soldier
cards.desc: You can change some or all of your HEART to ATTACK, and/or your ATTACK to HEART.

cards.name: Can Opener
cards.desc: You only need 3 DESTRUCTION to destroy a Tank.

cards.name: Ego Trip
cards.desc: Gain 1 ENERGY_POINT when you take Superstar and when you start your turn with it.

cards.name: Subway
cards.desc:
Heal 2 damage and take another turn.
During this extra turn, you can move as often as you like, whenever you like.

cards.name: Hotland Tunnel
cards.desc:
Buy this card for 1 ENERGY_POINT less if you are in MANHATTAN.
+6 VICTORY_POINT and all Monsters gain 3 ENERGY_POINT.

cards.name: Regeneration
cards.desc: Heal 1 damage at the start of your turn.

cards.name: WebSpinner
cards.desc:
When you deal damage to Monsters, give them a Web token. A Monster has one fewer reroll on his turn for each Web token he has.
A Monster can choose to use an ATTACK to discard a Web token instead of using it to attack.

cards.name: Stink Attack
cards.desc: Whenever you move, you may disperse up to four Units from your destination borough. Each dispersed Unit must move to a separate borough.

cards.name: Of Another World
cards.desc: You can use HEART_POINT as ENERGY_POINT and ENERGY_POINT as HEART_POINT.

cards.name: Next Stage
cards.desc:
Lose all your VICTORY_POINT.
Gain 1 ENERGY_POINT or heal 1 damage for each VICTORY_POINT you lost this way.

cards.name: Columbia University
cards.desc:
Buy this card for 1 ENERGY_POINT less if you are in MANHATTAN.
+2 VICTORY_POINT and take the next KEEP card revealed, for free.

cards.name: Natural Selection
cards.desc:
Gain 4 ENERGY_POINT and heal 4 damage when you buy this card.
You roll an extra die.
If you end your turn with at least 1 VICTORY, you lose this card, and all your HEART_POINT.

cards.name: Antimatter Pellets
cards.desc:
Monsters you attack must roll a die.
Those that roll OUCH take double damage.

cards.name: Tourist
cards.desc: Place a Souvenir token in your current borough, and in each borough you enter that does not already have a Souvenir token. Gain 1 VICTORY_POINT and 1 ENERGY_POINT each time you place a Souvenir token.

cards.name: Violent Star
cards.desc:
Deal 2 damage to the Monster from whom you take Superstar.
Deal 1 damage to the Monster who takes Superstar from you.

cards.name: Subterranean Cable
cards.desc: +4 ENERGY_POINT and take 4 damage.

cards.name: Brooklyn Bridge
cards.desc:
Buy this card for 1 ENERGY_POINT less if you are in BROOKLYN.
+4 VICTORY_POINT.

cards.name: Chameleon
cards.desc:
You can discard as many VICTORY as you wish.
For each VICTORY discarded, you can change the face of one of the dice you haven't resolved.

cards.name: Scavenger
cards.desc: You can buy KEEP cards from the discard by spending 1 ENERGY_POINT less than their cost.

cards.name: Trophy Hunter
cards.desc: Gain 1 VICTORY_POINT each time you destroy a Unit.

cards.name: Hailing Cars
cards.desc:
You may add 2 DESTRUCTION to your result.
If you do you can destroy only Units.

cards.name: Tesla Cannon
cards.desc:
+2 VICTORY_POINT.
All Monsters (including you) must discard one KEEP card.

cards.name: Climb The Empire State Building
cards.desc: If you roll 1 of each dice type in MANHATTAN, gain 2 VICTORY_POINT and take another turn.

cards.name: Overload
cards.desc:
Gain 4 ENERGY_POINT when you buy this card.
Gain 1 ENERGY_POINT less when you roll any amount of ENERGY.

cards.name: Chinatown Regular
cards.desc: Heal 2 damage when you enter MANHATTAN.

cards.name: Long Neck
cards.desc: You only need 2 DESTRUCTION to destroy a Jet.

cards.name: Extra Head
cards.desc: You get 1 extra die.

cards.name: Yankee Stadium
cards.desc:
Buy this card for 1 ENERGY less if you are in the BRONX.
+5 VICTORY_POINT and heal 5 damage.

cards.name: Artificial Heart
cards.desc: You can change soome or all of your HEART to ENERGY.

cards.name: Broadway Star
cards.desc: Gain 1 VICTORY_POINT when you take Superstar, and when you start your turn with it.

cards.name: Seismic Ray
cards.desc: Spend 1 ENERGY_POINT to use your DESTRUCTION in any borough other than where you are.

cards.name: Fireball
cards.desc: Your attacks also deal damage to the other Monsters in your borough.
